name: Framework-Agnostic Tracing
description: Not locked into LangChain or any single framework. Supports tracing across multiple LLM frameworks and custom implementations.

name: Self-Hosting & Data Sovereignty
description: Self-hosting option with full data sovereignty. Deploy on your own infrastructure with no data leaving your network.

name: Evaluation Framework
description: Built-in evaluation framework with LLM-as-judge, custom metrics, and regression testing capabilities.

name: OpenTelemetry Support
description: OpenTelemetry support for integration with existing observability stack. OTLP ingestion and standard instrumentation.

name: Prompt Management & Versioning
description: Prompt management and versioning with rollback capability. Playground testing and SDK integration.

name: Transparent Pricing at Scale
description: Transparent, predictable pricing at scale (100K+ traces/month). Clear cost structure without surprise overages.
